import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Grid, Typography, Avatar, TextField, Paper } from '@material-ui/core' import LockOutlinedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/LockOutlined'; import { NavLink, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Login.css' import { Modal, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { UserContext } from './UserProvider' import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from 'formik' import * as Yup from 'yup' const Login = () => { const { show, handleClose, forgotSubmit, setForgotEmail, handleShow } = useContext(UserContext) const paperStyle = { margin: '0 auto' } const avatarStyle = { backgroundColor: 'lightseagreen' } const btnstyle = { marginTop: '8px', marginBottom: '8px' } const linkButton = { marginTop: '8px' } const initialValues = { email: '', password: '', } const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ email: Yup.string().email('please enter valid email').required("Required"), password: Yup.string().required("Required") }) const onSubmit = (values, props) => { console.log(values) setTimeout(() => { props.resetForm() props.setSubmitting(false) }, 2000) console.log(props) } return ( <>
